title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Determine the specific areas of environmental impact to be simulated, what data will be required, and the desired outputs of the simulation.

title: Design the simulation algorithm
description: Develop a mathematical model to predict the environmental impact based on user-defined activities.

title: Develop the user interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input activity data and view simulation results.

title: Implement the database structure
description: Create and configure a suitable database to store user data and simulation results.

title: Develop the backend API
description: Write server-side code to handle user requests and calls to the simulation algorithm.

title: Test and debug the system
description: Perform functional testing to ensure that the simulation works as intended and fix any bugs.

title: Review project requirements and design
description: Ensure that the project's requirements are being met, and make any necessary adjustments to the project design.

title: Code review for simulation algorithm implementation
description: Review the implemented simulation algorithm to ensure it adheres to design specifications.

title: Code review for user interface development
description: Review the implemented user interface to ensure it meets design specifications and provides a good user experience.

title: Code review for backend API development
description: Review the implemented backend API to ensure it works correctly and handles requests efficiently.
